mapper.insert: insert into pay (payNum, cmplxPayNum, cardCompaNum, payWay, cardNum, payAmnt) values(#{payNum},#{cmplxPayNum},#{cardCompaNum},#{payWay},#{cardNum},#{payAmnt})
mapper.select: select payNum, cmplxPayNum, cardCompaNum, payWay, cardNum, payAmnt from pay Where payNum=#{payNum}
select payNum, cmplxPayNum, cardCompaNum, payWay, cardNum, payAmnt from pay where payNum > 0 order by payNum desc
